comment.body: 1. To be part of a revolution, a net truly owned by the people. 2. Torrentfreak I guess or reddit. I always thought that  in our times of facebook and surveillance decentralised networks may  be the future and that someone should develop it. Then I found ZeroNet ;)
Often the reason reveals itself in the future. Sometimes you need to go into the valley to know how big a mountain can be. Same goes for sadness and joy. :)
You're a funny guy, are you?
